change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 175/2006, effective December 15, 2006.

section.sectiontext: The National Fire Code of Canada 1995, as it existed on January 1, 1998, is adopted as the British Columbia Fire Code, with

paragraph.paragraphtext: the changes set out in the attachment to the British Columbia Fire Code Regulation, made by B.C. Reg. 285/98, except to the extent that the changes in that attachment are amended by amendments set out in the Schedule to this order, and
the amendments set out in the Schedule to this order.
